description: Retrieves details about all specified findings for an incident, including descriptive details about each finding. A finding represents a recent application environment change made by an CodeDeploy deployment or an CloudFormation stack creation or update that can be investigated as a potential cause of the incident.

parameters.name: findingIds
parameters.description: A list of IDs of findings for which you want to view details. (string) ---

parameters.name: incidentRecordArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the incident for which you want to view finding details.

nested_items.name: errors
nested_items.description: A list of errors encountered during the operation.

nested_items.name: code
nested_items.description: The code associated with an error that was returned for a BatchGetIncidentFindings operation.

nested_items.name: findingId
nested_items.description: The ID of a specified finding for which an error was returned for a BatchGetIncidentFindings operation.

nested_items.name: message
nested_items.description: The description for an error that was returned for a BatchGetIncidentFindings operation.

nested_items.name: creationTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp for when a finding was created.

nested_items.name: cloudFormationStackUpdate
nested_items.description: Information about the CloudFormation stack creation or update associated with the finding.

nested_items.name: endTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp for when the CloudFormation stack creation or update ended. Not reported for deployments that are still in progress.

nested_items.name: stackArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the CloudFormation stack involved in the update.

nested_items.name: startTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp for when the CloudFormation stack creation or update began.

nested_items.name: codeDeployDeployment
nested_items.description: Information about the CodeDeploy deployment associated with the finding.

nested_items.name: deploymentGroupArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the CodeDeploy deployment group associated with the deployment.

nested_items.name: deploymentId
nested_items.description: The ID of the CodeDeploy deployment.

nested_items.name: endTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp for when the CodeDeploy deployment ended. Not reported for deployments that are still in progress.

nested_items.name: startTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp for when the CodeDeploy deployment began.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The ID assigned to the finding.

nested_items.name: lastModifiedTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp for when the finding was most recently updated with additional information.
